model.title: Model
model.description: Please choose the model you want to use.

apiKey.title: API KEY
apiKey.description: Please put your API KEY inside of the input box

hostUrl.title: Host Base URL
hostUrl.description: Please provide the base URL of the private OpenAI API-compatible server.

hideOnClickOutside.title: Hide Spotlight Windows when clicking outside
hideOnClickOutside.description: If you click anywhere outside of the Spotlight Window, we will hide the spotlight window.

autoCopy.title: Auto Copy before Launching Spotlight Window
autoCopy.description: Automatically trigger the "Ctrl/Cmd + C" key combination before launching the spotlight window, this will happen right after you hit the hotkeys for the spotlight window.

hotkey.title: Spotlight Window Hotkey
hotkey.description: Set the hotkey to launch the spotlight window.

dialog.title: Press a Hotkey Combination
dialog.message: Press more than two keys at the same time, press ESC to cancel

shortcut.title: Shortcut
shortcut.description: Please provide the shortcut the App should detect.

name.title: Template Name
name.description: Please input template name, only letter, numbers and underscore ("_") is allowed

responseKey.title: Response Key
responseKey.description: If you are expecting the model retuning a JSON format response, please provide the key the App should use.

content.title: Template
content.placeholder: Enter your template in markdown format

confirmDelete.title: Delete Template
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
